title: Apple Barrel Acrylic Paint Set, 16 Piece (2-Ounce), Best Colors Count
description: The Apple Barrel PROMOABIII 16 pc Acrylic Paint Set is the must-have paint kit for all your craft projects big and small. The bright, bold colors of this versatile acrylic paint kit are easy-to-use and glide on smoothly with excellent coverage. Use Apple Barrel Acrylic Paint on a variety of surfaces including wood, Styrofoam, plaster, terra cotta, and so much more! With 16 fun colors, you can brush, stamp, stencil or sponge this acrylic paint on all of your projects. Every crafter needs an affordable, quality set like Apple Barrel PROMOABIII 16 pc Acrylic Paint Set as a key part of their go-to arts and crafts supplies.
